User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

In the Config: I set mailnews.remember_selected_message = true.

In the Inbox: I open a received message in TB's message pane (instead of a new window).



Actual results:

Then, when I don't want to see that message any more in TB's message pane, I deselect that message via "[Ctrl] + mouseclick on that message" (Windows 7).

But then, when I open another folder (e. g. trash), and then go back to the Inbox, the previously deselected message is selected again and also displayed/opened again in TB's message pane.
Thus TB still remebers this message.


Expected results:

If a message gets deselected, mailnews.remember_selected_message = true shouldn't remember it any more.
comments.creator: dfghjkjhg@spaml.de
